# Mattock of the Titans
## Overview
**Aura** strong transmutation; **CL** 16th

**Slot** â€”

**Price** 23,348 gp

**Weight** 120 lbs.

**Description**

This digging tool is 10 feet long. Any creature of at least Huge size can use it to loosen or tumble earth or earthen ramparts (a 10-foot cube every 10 minutes). It also smashes rock (a 10- foot cube per hour). If used as a weapon, it is the equivalent of a Gargantuan *+3 [[Adamantine|adamantine]] warhammer*, dealing 4d6 points of base damage.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Move Earth (Spell)|move earth]]*

**Cost** 13,348 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 523
